00025 namespace util

00028 ProgressFeedback &ProgressFeedback::operator++()
00029 {
00030     progress();
00031     return *this;
00032 }
00033 
00034 void ConsoleFeedback::show( size_t max, std::string header )
00035 {
00036     header += "\n";
00037     disp.reset( new boost::progress_display( max, std::cout, header ) );
00038 }
00039 void ConsoleFeedback::close()
00040 {
00041     disp.reset();
00042 }
00043 size_t ConsoleFeedback::getMax()
00044 {
00045     return disp ? disp->expected_count() : 0;
00046 }
00047 size_t ConsoleFeedback::progress( const std::string message, size_t step )
00048 {
00049     LOG_IF( !disp, Debug, error ) << "Cannot call progress on a not displayed ConsoleFeedBack.";
00050     LOG_IF( !message.empty(), Debug, warning ) << "ConsoleFeedBack does ignore the message string";
00051     return disp->operator+=( step );
00052 }
